snippet: A class of apps will stitch together a series of photos into a nearly seamless whole — or cheat a bit, and make a panorama out of a single shot.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights panorama apps for smartphones that help stitch together multiple or moving snapshots of view for wide-angle image.
lead_paragraph: A class of apps will stitch together a series of photos into a nearly seamless whole — or cheat a bit, and make a panorama out of a single shot.
